name: br-state-codes
title: Federation units of Brazil and ISO3166:BR
description: Brazilian states 2-letter codes (ISO 3166-2:BR), official 'Unidades da Federação' abbreviations throughout the country's history

sources.title: Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions, Brazil
sources.name: ISO

sources.title: CONHEÇA CIDADES E ESTADOS DO BRASIL
sources.name: IBGE

fields.name: report
fields.description: Label of the report describing the project

fields.name: name
fields.description: The title or name of the project

fields.name: url
fields.description: the URL of the project

fields.name: adherence
fields.description: Degree of adherence to br-state-codes use

fields.name: usedColumns
fields.description: the used columns of br-state-codes in the project, separating by commas

fields.name: description
fields.description: A synopsis about the use of the dataset in the project

fields.name: subdivision
fields.description: State-name 2-letter abbreviation (in portuguese 'sigla da unidade da federação'), ISO 3166:BR
fields.title: Subdivision (Federal Unit)

fields.name: region
fields.description: Region name abbreviation with 1 or 2 letters
fields.title: Region

fields.name: name_prefix
fields.description: Name prefix, in portuguese
fields.title: Prefix

fields.name: name
fields.description: Common name of the state, in portuguese
fields.title: Name

fields.name: id
fields.title: Serial ID
fields.description: Short serial ID for subdivisions, starting from 1 (for base36 subtract 1). Historic (non-current) starting from 30.

fields.name: idIBGE
fields.description: IBGE statdandard identifier
fields.title: ID of IBGE

fields.name: wdId
fields.description: Wikidata concept (semantic) identifier
fields.title: Wikidata ID

fields.name: lexLabel
fields.description: Brazilian's LEX URN syntax translation of the official state name. Used in URLs and other contexts
fields.title: Label for URN-LEX

fields.name: creation
fields.description: State official creation year
fields.title: Creation year

fields.name: extinction
fields.description: State official creation year (null for in use)
fields.title: Extinction year

fields.name: category
fields.description: Subdivision category (see ISO 3166-2)
fields.title: Category

fields.name: timeZone
fields.description: Time Zone standard label
fields.title: Time Zone (reference city)

fields.name: utcOffset
fields.description: UTC offset
fields.title: UTC offset

fields.name: utcOffset_DST
fields.description: UTC offset at summer (when using Daylight Saving Time - DST)
fields.title: UTC offset at DST

fields.name: postalCode_ranges
fields.description: Numeric ranges of postal codes
fields.title: Postal-code ranges

fields.name: notes
fields.description: Notes about assegments, dates or changes
fields.title: Notes
